cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 5, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7314, Assessing Xi’s Interference and Subversion Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 57 (Thursday, March 31, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BARR:
H.R. 7314.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H4073]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: AXIS Act
